Subject : Exemption from pre-embarkation security checks at Civil Airports. 
 
In supersession of this Bureau Circular No. 41/2005 dated 28.9.2005,  it has been 
decided that the following VVIPs / VIPs and  their accompanying spouse are exempted from 
pre-embarkation security checks at all civil airports in the country. 
 
1. President 
2. Vice President 
3. Prime Minister 
4. Former Presidents 
5. Speaker of Lok Sabha 
6. Chief Justice of India 
7. Judges of Supreme Court   
8. Leader of Opposition in Lok Sabha & Rajya Sabha 
9. Union Ministers of Cabinet rank  
10. Deputy Chairman Rajya Sabha & Deputy Speaker Lok  Sabha 
11. Governors of States 
12. Chief Ministers of States 
13. Minister of State of the Union Council of Ministers 
14. Chief Justices of the High Courts 
15. Lt. Governors of Union Territories 
16. Chief Ministers of  Union Territories 
17. Deputy Chief Ministers of States 
18. Deputy Chief Ministers of Union Territories 
19. Ambassadors of foreign countries, Charge D’ Affairs and High Commissioners and their 
spouses 
20. Cabinet Secretary 
21. Visiting Foreign dignitaries of the same status as at Sl. Nos. 1 to 3,5,6,9 & 11 above 
22. His Holiness the Dalai Lama 
23. SPG Protectees 
24. Shri Robert Vadra, while travelling with SPG Protectees. 
 
2. 
It is reiterated that except the categories specified above, all other categories of 
passengers, traveling by air through the civilian airports in the country, are to be 
subjected to pre-embarkation  security checks without making any exception in any 
particular case. 
(D.S.Chauhan) 
Addl. Commissioner of  Security (CA)
